topic.title: Help about motivation
topic.body: What do you guys do when you have no motivation and lack focus at work ? I really need it.

topic.title: BTC wallet
topic.body:
Is it safe to use a bitcoin wallet created with your ZeroID public and private key ? I mean, only you can access the users.json file right ?

I also wanted to know where we can find the address to retrieve the BTCs donated to a zite with the button on the right panel.

1_1k8EGYLYfhutuFjGEoC7nhQ9cbu4eT35G.body:
Plz go here : http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit
The Chinese forum. You are supposed to talk english here

1_1Aqzrn9MJnftKMJyU9mVviE5WZdTwJnkFr.body:
> [netwatcher443](#comment_11_163qySY2DPqhhxhinT9SAF5D4BXzoZvp6z): have a rest

I need to, but not before the end of the week... I don't have time and need to finish this shitty work the faster I can
I'm a programmer and I have a shitty mission that doesn't interest me at all so I can't find the resources to work properly...
But thank you all for your advices, that helps :)

> [gdd](#comment_81_1LESBhM9ResjKhCCNhgbNDVFKcfdQractA): health will made any work to be interesting

Yeah... Lack of sleep is my main weakness

> [alaric](#comment_42_1HiyP7AD74uGuGBZLqhcmfQgwu5VC8nnYY): I started writing out a lengthy, serious reply but it started coming off as a "humble brag", so I'll keep it short. [...]

Thank you for that answer. I guess that's what is coming the more often. I applied in 2 different company to work with next year, and that means leaving the company I started in, and in which I'm currently facing that problem.
I will still think about that decision (it's tough and important) but your help is really appreciated, to all of you as well.
Thanks

> [scrubthesecond](#comment_53_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgtTUqCe): Do you think most people can afford to do that? In Australia, most people are living pay check to pay check and if they stop working, they'll be homeless.

He didn't say to stop working, he said 'find another job'. That means searching and applying while you have one

1_1BpNbHgqwXTmdgJar9TbkFpNrD43ztsKWy.body:
> [akito](#comment_111_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Okay, then tell me how they can afford the VPN. Who pays for it?

Me ? Pro users ? Those who thinks this is a good company and a good VPN and want to use all of its potential ? It's not just free, you can use it for free but with some limitations compared to the ones who subscribe.

1_14HHhFiXxtgfkdLTEtxxayMQKh4SighJeW.body:
I think you didn't get the whole concept of ZeroNet :/
On ZeroNet you can only find ZeroNet websites. If you want to go to Twitter then go here : https://twitter.com
